segments.text: Sir , would you like some dessert now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please show me the menu again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . sir , the chocolate cake is very delicious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . I don't like chocolate . I'd like strawberry pie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid there is none .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'll have vanilla ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . I will bring it right away .
segments.speaker: S1
